name: Kasiori
overview:
A falling object puzzle with a sweets motif of beautiful girls!

-A falling block puzzle game in which cute beautiful girls appear and play against each other with a puzzle with the motif of “sweets”.
If you arrange three sweets that fall from the top of the screen side by side, the sweets will disappear.

● When you hit the bottles against each other, the sweets in the bottle will break and appear. When it breaks, a chain occurs in eight directions.

● You can play in either the one-player mode or the two-player mode, which is tailored to the story.

-Cotton, the main character of the popular “Cotton Rock and Roll”, has also appeared and is used as a player character.
